title: Notes
description: One of my first bigger projects I worked on was notes, it was very fun to work on as I learned a lot about firstoreDB and React. I also added an anonymouse feature for people that werent interested in storing them on their account but did want to use/ test it.

title: Quotebook
description: Quotebook is a React site with firestoreDB, I was inspired by a friend who wrote all of the funny things we said down in a whatsapp group, so he told me to create a website in which you can share all the funny things your friends say. It was really fun to make and also very entertaining to read through.

title: City-Master
description: City-Master is a React game built in collaboration with a friend, it is a strategy game where you build a city whilst riding around in a car, many obstacles maay get in your way and will reduce your earnings per second. Utilize roads to get around quickly.
